1408.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-61-8, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Repealer From July 1, 2015, To July 1, 2018, On The Provision Requiring School Districts With A Low Ending Balance Of School Maintenance Funds To Submit Plans For Budget Cuts To The State Department Of Education; And For Related Purposes.

1409.title: Livestock facilities; extend repealer on authority of certain organizations to hold shows at no charge.
1409.description: An Act To Amend Section 69-5-114, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On The Provision Of Law That Authorizes Certain Organizations To Use Certain Livestock Facilities For Livestock Shows At No Cost To The Organizations For Such Use; And For Related Purposes.

1410.title: Interagency Farm to School Council; extend repealer on for 3 years.
1410.description: An Act To Amend Section 69-1-351, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On The Provision Of Law That Establishes And Prescribes The Powers And Duties Of The Interagency Farm To School Council; And For Related Purposes.

1411.title: Alcoholic beverages; extend repealer on law authorizing holder of package retailer's permit to hold tasting/sampling events.
1411.description: An Act To Amend Section 67-1-52, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Holder Of A Package Retailer's Permit Issued Under The Local Option Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, With Prior Written Approval From The Department Of Revenue, To Conduct Tasting Or Sampling Events At The Package Retailer's Permitted Place Of Business During Which Tastes Or Samples Of Alcoholic Beverages May Be Offered Or Served To Consumers At No Cost Subject To Certain Conditions, To Extend The Date Of Repeal On Such Section; And For Related Purposes.

1412.title: Mississippi Country and Western Music Commission; remove the repealer on.
1412.description: An Act To Amend Section 39-32-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Creates The Mississippi Country And Western Music Commission And Provides For Its Powers And Functions; To Amend Section 2, Chapter 495, Laws Of 2011, To Remove The Repealer From This Section; And For Related Purposes.

1413.title: Bolivar County Regional Facility; extend repealer on drug and alcohol program.
1413.description: An Act To Amend Section 47-5-940, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Date Of Repeal From July 3, 2015, To July 3, 2018, On The Drug And Alcohol Treatment Program At The Bolivar County Regional Facility; And For Related Purposes.

1414.title: Community Service Revolving Fund; extend repealer on.
1414.description: An Act To Amend Section 47-7-49, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Extend The Repeal Date From June 30, 2015, To June 30, 2018, On The Community Service Revolving Fund, Which Provides The Fee That Is Paid By Offenders Who Are On Probation, Parole Or Any Other Field Supervision Of The Mississippi Department Of Corrections; And For Related Purposes.

1416.title: Mississippi Business Finance Corporation; delete repealer on authority to issue bonds to finance economic development projects.
1416.description: An Act To Reenact Sections 57-10-401 Through 57-10-445, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For The Issuance Of Bonds By The Mississippi Business Finance Corporation To Finance Economic Development Projects In Order To Induce The Location Or Expansion Of Certain Businesses Within This State; To Amend Reenacted Section 57-10-411, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reflect The Name Change For The State Tax Commission To The Department Of Revenue; To Reenact Section 27-7-22.3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For A Credit Against State Income Taxes For Certain Companies For Debt Service Paid By Such Companies Under Financing Agreements Entered Into With The Mississippi Business Finance Corporation Under Section 57-10-409; To Repeal Section 57-10-449, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For The October 1, 2015, Repeal Of Sections 57-10-401 Through 57-10-445 And 27-7-22.3, Mississippi Code Of 1972; And For Related Purposes.

1417.title: Attala County; authorize the issuance of bonds for certain costs related to county owned hospital.
1417.description: An Act To Authorize Attala County, Mississippi, To Issue Bonds Of The County To Raise Money To Provide For Certain Costs And Obligations Incurred Either By The County, On Behalf Of Montfort Jones Memorial Hospital, Or By The Hospital; To Authorize The County To Sell Or Lease The Hospital; To Authorize The Board Of Trustees Of The Hospital, A Public Community Hospital, To Petition For Relief From Debts And Financial Obligations Of The Hospital Under Chapter 9 Of Title 11, United States Code; And For Related Purposes.

1418.title: Attala County; authorize the issuance of bonds for certain costs related to county-owned hospital.
1418.description: An Act To Authorize Attala County, Mississippi, To Issue Bonds Of The County To Raise Money To Provide For Certain Costs And Obligations Incurred Either By The County, On Behalf Of Montfort Jones Memorial Hospital, Or By The Hospital; To Authorize The County To Sell Or Lease The Hospital; To Authorize The Board Of Trustees Of The Hospital, A Public Community Hospital, To Petition For Relief From Debts And Financial Obligations Of The Hospital Under Chapter 9 Of Title 11, United States Code; And For Related Purposes.

1419.title: DeSoto County; authorize employment of part-time assistant county prosecuting attorneys.
1419.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Desoto County, Mississippi, To Employ Such Additional Part-time County Prosecuting Attorneys As It Determines Necessary; And For Related Purposes.

1420.title: Town of Pope; authorize to enter into an agreement with certain water association to end water services for customer with delinquent sewer payment.
1420.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The Town Of Pope, Mississippi, To Enter Into An Interlocal Agreement With The Pope Courtland Water Association That Requires The Association To Terminate The Water Service Of Customers Who Are Delinquent In The Payment Of Charges For Sewer Services Provided By The Town Of Pope; And For Related Purposes.

1421.title: Copiah County; authorize contribution via funds or services to Calling Panther Heritage Foundation.
1421.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Copiah County, Mississippi, To Make A Contribution In Funds Or Services To Calling Panther Heritage Foundation; And For Related Purposes.

1422.title: City of Indianola; extend repealer on authority to fix and collect fees to provide mosquito and pest control services.
1422.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 925, Local And Private Laws Of 2012, To Extend The Date Of Repeal From December 31, 2015, To December 31, 2018, On The Provision Of Law That Authorizes The City Of Indianola, Mississippi, To Provide Services For Mosquito And Pest Control By Fixing And Collecting Fees For Such Service; And For Related Purposes.

1423.title: City of D'Iberville; revise purposes for which gaming fees may be expended.
1423.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 868, Local And Private Laws Of 1992, To Revise The Purposes For Which The Revenue From Fees Imposed By The City Of D'iberville On Cruise Vessels That Dock In The City Of D'iberville May Be Expended; And For Related Purposes.

1424.title: City of Grenada; extend the repeal date on the Grenada Tourism Commission and the Grenada tourist and convention tax.
1424.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 879, Local And Private Laws Of 1992, As Last Amended By Chapter 940, Local And Private Laws Of 2011, To Extend The Date Of Repeal From September 30, 2015, To September 30, 2018, On The Provisions Of Law That Establishes The Grenada Tourism Commission And Authorizes The Imposition Of A Tourist And Convention Tax; To Provide For An Indirect Referendum On The Continuation Of The Levying Of Such Tax; And For Related Purposes.

1425.title: City of Brandon; authorize contracts for naming rights for the city's park buildings and structures.
1425.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Brandon, Mississippi, To Contract For Naming Rights For The City's Park Buildings And Structures; And For Related Purposes.

1426.title: Tishomingo County; authorize to levy a tax on sales of beer, light wine and alcoholic beverages.
1426.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Tishomingo County, Mississippi, To Levy An Additional 2% Tax Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Of Light Wine, Beer And Alcoholic Beverages In The County; To Provide That The Tax Shall Be Used To Promote Youth Activities; And For Related Purposes.

1427.title: City of Olive Branch; authorize contracts for naming rights for the city's park buildings and structures.
1427.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Olive Branch, Mississippi, To Contract For Naming Rights For The City's Park Buildings And Structures; And For Related Purposes.

1428.title: Lauderdale County; authorize to fund Chaplaincy Program of the detention facility from revenue of inmate phone service.
1428.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Lauderdale County, Mississippi, To Fund The Lauderdale County Detention Facility's Good News Jail And Prison Ministry Chaplain And Chaplaincy Program From Nontax Revenue Generated By The Inmate Telephone Service; And For Related Purposes.

1429.title: Coahoma County; may enter into certain construction contracts even if they extend 30 days beyond board's term.
1429.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Coahoma County, Mississippi, To Enter Into Certain Road Improvement Contracts Regardless Of Whether The Contracts May Extend Beyond 30 Days From The Termination And End Of The Term Of Office Of The Members Of The Board Of Supervisors Awarding The Contracts; And For Related Purposes.

1430.title: City of Baldwin; extend repeal date on tax on hotels, motels, restaurants and convenience stores to promote tourism.
1430.description: An Act To Amend Chapter 1017, Local And Private Laws Of 2004, As Amended By Chapter 921, Local And Private Laws Of 2008, As Amended By Chapter 911, Local And Private Laws Of 2012, To Extend The Repeal Date From July 1, 2015, To July 1, 2018, On The Authority Of The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Baldwyn To Levy A Tax Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Hotels And Motels Derived From Room Rentals And Upon The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Of Restaurants And Sales Of Prepared Food At Convenience Stores, Which Shall Be Used To Promote Tourism And To Encourage Retired Persons To Remain In Or Relocate To The Baldwyn Area; To Provide For An Indirect Referendum On The Continuation Of The Levying Of Such Tax; And For Related Purposes.

1433.title: DeSoto County; authorize donations to the DeSoto County Economic Development Council, Inc.
1433.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Desoto County, Mississippi, To Donate Funds And In-kind Donations And Support To The Desoto County Economic Development Council, Inc.; And For Related Purposes.

1434.title: Tallahatchie county; authorize to assist in the construction, equipping or furnishing of a recreational center or area in Town of Tutwiler.
1434.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Tallahatchie County, Mississippi, To Assist The Town Of Tutwiler, Mississippi, In The Construction, Equipping Or Furnishing Of A Recreational Center Or Area In Such Town; And For Related Purposes.

1435.title: Washington County; authorize levy of special tax on real and personal property to support operation of fire protection districts.
1435.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Washington County, Mississippi, To Levy A Special Tax That Is Not To Exceed Two Mills Annually On All Real And Personal Property Within The Fire Protection Districts Of The County In Order To Operate, Maintain And Support Such Districts; And For Related Purposes.

1436.title: Marshall County; authorize contribution to certain qualified charitable organizations.
1436.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Marshall County, Mississippi, To Make Contributions To Qualified Charitable Organizations Having A Valid And Current (501)(c)(3) Designation; And For Related Purposes.

1437.title: City of Corinth; authorize the city to impose a sales tax at the rate of 1/4 of 1% and utilize the revenue for certain purposes.
1437.description: An Act To Authorize The Governing Authorities Of The City Of Corinth, Mississippi, To Impose A Special Tax Not To Exceed 1/4 Of 1% On The Gross Proceeds Of Sales Or Gross Income Businesses In The City From Activities Taxed At The Rate Of 7% Or More Under The Mississippi Sales Tax Law; To Provide For An Election On The Question Of Imposing The Special Sales Tax; To Authorize The City To Incur Indebtedness In An Amount Not Greater Than An Amount Whose Debt Service Is Capable Of Being Funded By The Revenue From The Special Sales Tax; To Provide That Revenue Collected From The Special Sales Tax Must Be Expended By The City Only To Fund Infrastructure Projects And Economic Development Projects; And For Related Purposes.

1438.title: Bonds; authorize for community and junior college capital improvements.
1438.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds For The Purpose Of Making Capital Improvements For Community And Junior Colleges; And For Related Purposes.

1439.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Jackson State University with Endowed Professorship Challenge Grant Program.
1439.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Jackson State University In The Establishment, Operation And Administration Of An Endowed Professorship Challenge Grant Program; And For Related Purposes.

1440.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds to assist JSU with Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM) Program.
1440.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Jackson State University In The Administration And Operation Of A Science, Technology, Engineering And Mathematics (stem) Program; And For Related Purposes.

1441.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for certain lighting improvements to Rose E. Mccoy Auditorium at Jackson State University.
1441.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Acquisition And Installation Of Lighting Equipment And Fixtures For The Floors And Ramps Inside And Leading Into Rose E. Mccoy Auditorium At Jackson State University; And For Related Purposes.

1442.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for construction of building for School of Public Health at Jackson State University.
1442.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of A New Building And Related Facilities To House The School Of Public Health At Jackson State University; And For Related Purposes.

1443.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for repair and renovation of College of Education and Human Development at Jackson State University.
1443.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Repair, Renovation And Expansion Of And Additions And Improvements To The Joseph H. Jackson Building For The College Of Education And Human Development At Jackson State University; And For Related Purposes.

1444.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for certain railroad line improvements.
1444.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying A Portion Of The Costs Associated With The Repair, Rehabilitation, Construction, Reconstruction, Upgrading And Improvement Of The Existing Railroad Line And Related Facilities Running From The City Of Amory, Mississippi, To The City Of Fulton, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1445.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Rail Authority of East Mississippi with certain costs associated with East Mississippi Intermodal Rail Corridor.
1445.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The Rail Authority Of East Mississippi In Paying Engineering And Design Costs Associated With The Development And Construction Of The East Mississippi Intermodal Rail Corridor; And For Related Purposes.

1446.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Jackson in making improvements to the Woodrow Wilson Avenue Bridge.
1446.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Jackson, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With The Repair And Rehabilitation Or Replacement And Reconstruction Of The Woodrow Wilson Avenue Bridge In Jackson, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1447.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Jackson with repair and rehabilitation of the Woodrow Wilson Avenue Bridge.
1447.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Jackson, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With The Repair And Rehabilitation Of The Woodrow Wilson Avenue Bridge In Jackson, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1448.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds to assist Hinds County in construction of the Byram-Clinton Parkway project.
1448.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Hinds County, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Of Construction And Development Of The Byram-clinton Parkway Project; And For Related Purposes.

1449.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Vicksburg with construction of the Vicksburg Interpretive Center.
1449.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Vicksburg, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Of Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of The Vicksburg Interpretive Center And Related Facilities In Vicksburg, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1451.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for construction of a new Highway Safety Patrol Substation in Starkville.
1451.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of A New Highway Safety Patrol Substation In Starkville, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1452.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Columbus with constructing certain improvements in coordination with Columbus Air Force Base.
1452.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Columbus, Mississippi, Working In Coordination With Columbus Air Force Base, In Paying Costs Associated With Construction And Development Of Walking Tracks, Walking Trails, Bicycle Paths And Trails, Hunting Ranges, Firing Ranges, And Other Recreational Properties And Facilities For The Purpose Of Providing And Improving Available Quality Of Life Activities Located On And/or Near Columbus Air Force Base; And For Related Purposes.

1453.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist Lowndes County with construction of an equine center.
1453.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist Lowndes County, Mississippi, In Paying The Costs Of Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of An Equine Center And Related Facilities In Lowndes County, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1454.title: Bonds; authorize issuance city of Oxford in extending West Oxford Loop.
1454.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Oxford, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With Extending West Oxford Loop In Lafayette County, Mississippi, From An Intersection Near Mississippi Highway 6 To An Intersection Near Mississippi Highway 314 In Lafayette County, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1455.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to assist City of Jackson with removal and demolition of certain dilapidated and blighted properties.
1455.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Jackson, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With The Acquisition, Removal And Demolition Of Dilapidated And Blighted Properties Located In Close Proximity To Certain State Grounds And Lands And Such Properties Located Within Or In Close Proximity To The Farish Street Historic District; And For Related Purposes.

1456.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for loans to Hinds County to assist in certain projects.
1456.description: An Act To Authorize The Mississippi Development Authority To Make Loans To Hinds County, Mississippi, For Development Projects Located In Hinds County; To Give The Mississippi Development Authority Certain Powers And Duties Regarding Any Such Loan; To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $30,000,000.00 To Provide Funds To Make The Loans Authorized By This Act; And For Related Purposes.

1457.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for improvements to Jackson Zoo.
1457.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Improvements To The Jackson Zoo; And For Related Purposes.

1458.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for improvements to Jackson Zoo and Livingston Park.
1458.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Improvements To The Jackson Zoo And Livingston Park; And For Related Purposes.

1459.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for improvements to the Jackson Zoo and Livingston Park.
1459.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Improvements To The Jackson Zoo And Livingston Park; And For Related Purposes.

1460.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for the Local Law Enforcement Bullet Proof Vest Matching Grant Fund.
1460.description: An Act To Create In The State Treasury A Special Fund To Be Designated As The "local Law Enforcement Bullet Proof Vest Matching Grant Fund," Which Shall Be Administered By The Division Of Public Safety Planning Within The Mississippi Department Of Public Safety, For The Purpose Of Providing State Matching Funds To Eligible Law Enforcement Agencies For The Purchase Of Bullet Proof Vests For Law Enforcement Officers Employed By The Agency; To Authorize The Issuance Of $500,000.00 Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Local Law Enforcement Bullet Proof Vest Matching Grant Fund; And For Related Purposes.

1461.title: Bonds; authorize issuance of general obligation bonds for various Mississippi Development Authority programs.
1461.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $25,000,000.00 For The Ace Fund; To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $1,000,000.00 For The Mississippi Job Protection Act Fund; To Amend Section 57-1-307, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $4,000,000.00 The Amount Of State General Obligation Bonds That May Be Issued For The Local Governments Capital Improvements Revolving Loan Fund; To Amend Section 57-61-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $10,000,000.00 The Amount Of General Obligation Bonds That May Be Issued Under The Mississippi Business Investment Act; To Amend Section 57-61-36, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $10,000,000.00 The Amount Of Bond Proceeds That The Mississippi Development Authority May Utilize Under The Mississippi Business Investment Act To Make Grants Or Loans To Counties And Municipalities Through An Equipment And Public Facilities Grant And Loan Fund To Aid In Infrastructure-related Improvements, The Purchase Of Equipment And In The Purchase, Construction Or Repair And Renovation Of Public Facilities; To Amend Section 65-4-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase By $10,000,000.00 The Amount Of General Obligation Bonds That May Be Issued Under The Economic Development Highway Act; And For Related Purposes.

1462.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for the Mississippi Community Heritage Preservation Grant Fund.
1462.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of $5,000,000.00 Of State General Obligation Bonds For The Purpose Of Providing Funds For The Mississippi Community Heritage Preservation Grant Fund; To Amend Section 39-5-145, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; To Increase The Amount Of Funds That May Be Disbursed As Grant Funds To The City Of Columbus, Mississippi, To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With Repair, Renovation And Restoration Of The Columbus City Hall Building And Related Facilities; To Provide For The Disbursement Of Grant Funds To Wayne County, Mississippi, To Assist In Paying The Costs Associated With Repair, Renovation And Restoration Of The Wayne County Courthouse; And For Related Purposes.

1463.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for the Water Pollution Control Revolving Fund.
1463.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $5,800,000.00 To Provide Matching Funds For Federal Funds For The Water Pollution Control Revolving Fund; To Amend Section 49-17-85, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize Interest And Investment Earnings On Money In The Water Pollution Control Revolving Fund To Be Utilized To Pay Debt Service On The Bonds Authorized To Be Issued By This Act; And For Related Purposes.

1464.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds for public school capital improvements.
1464.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds Of The State Of Mississippi For The Purpose Of Providing Funds To School Districts In The State For Capital Improvements; And For Related Purposes.

1465.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University Agriculture Programs for establishing a meat processing facility.
1465.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To The Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs For The Establishment Of A Meat Processing Facility In Or Near Dekalb, Mississippi, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1466.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for making modifications to buildings to comply with Americans with Disabilities Act.
1466.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To Alcorn State University For Making Modifications To Several Selected High Priority Buildings To Comply With The Americans With Disabilities Act For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1467.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs to restore funding to FY 2001 level of funding.
1467.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs To Restore The Funding For The Agricultural Programs To The Fiscal Year 2001 Level Of Funding, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1468.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for improving campus safety and security.
1468.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To Alcorn State University For Improving Campus Safety And Security For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1469.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for expansion of research and production of shiitake mushrooms.
1469.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To The Mississippi Small Farm And Agribusiness Center At Alcorn State University In Partnership With The Mississippi Natural Products Association For The Expansion Of Research Relating To And The Production Of Shiitake Mushrooms And Other Specialty Mushrooms For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1470.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for design and planning of construction of new student union complex.
1470.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To Alcorn State University For The Design And Planning Of The Construction Of A New Student Union Complex On Its Main Campuses In Lorman For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1471.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for renovating the Whitney Health and P.E. Complex or constructing a new academic convocation center.
1471.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To Alcorn State University For The Design And Planning Of Renovating The Davey L. Whitney Health And Physical Education Complex Or Constructing A New Academic Convocation Center Into The Whitney Complex For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1472.title: Appropriation; IHL for Alcorn State University for construction of Rudolph E. Waters Academic Technology Classroom Building.
1472.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To Alcorn State University For Construction Of The Rudolph E. Waters Academic Technology Classroom Building For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1473.title: Appropriations; IHL for Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs for renovation and repair of aquaculture facility.
1473.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding To The Alcorn State University Agricultural Programs For The Renovation And Repair Of The Aquaculture Facility On The Lorman Campus For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1474.title: Appropriation; Archives and History for preplanning new museum of Mississippi's Native American heritage.
1474.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Archives And History For The Purpose Of Preplanning The Establishment Of A New Museum At Winterville Mounds In Washington County To Highlight Mississippi's Rich Native American Heritage, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1475.title: Appropriation; MS Arts Commission to provide funding for Greenville Arts Council.
1475.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi Arts Commission For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The Greenville Arts Council For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1476.title: Appropriation; Department of Health for a grant to the Southern Health Commission in Washington County.
1476.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The State Department Of Health To Provide A Grant To The Southern Health Commission, Inc., A Health And Wellness Center In Washington County For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1477.title: Appropriation; Department of Health to establish and operate two STD/HIV specialty clinics.
1477.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The State Department Of Health For The Purpose Of Developing, Establishing And Operating Two Std/hiv Specialty Clinics For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1478.title: Appropriation; Hinds County for renovating and making security improvements to Adult Detention Center.
1478.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Supervisors Of Hinds County For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For Renovating And Making Security Improvements To The Adult Detention Center In The City Of Raymond For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1479.title: Corporate corridor redevelopment zones; authorize designation of and certain tax incentives for qualified businesses.
1479.description: An Act To Authorize The Mississippi Development Authority To Designate Corporate Corridor Redevelopment Zones; To Authorize The Mississippi Development Authority To Certify Business Enterprises That Meet Certain Criteria And Are Located In Corporate Corridor Redevelopment Zones As Qualified Business Enterprises Under This Act; To Provide That Such Qualified Business Enterprises Shall Be Eligible For An Accelerated State Income Tax Depreciation Deduction, For Certain Sales Tax Exemptions And For A Fee-in-lieu Of Ad Valorem Taxes; To Amend Section 27-31-104, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize County Boards Of Supervisors And Municipal Governing Authorities To Grant A Fee-in-lieu Of Ad Valorem Taxes To Qualified Business Enterprises As Defined In This Act; To Amend Section 27-65-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Materials Used In The Construction Of A Facility, Or Any Addition Or Improvement Thereon, And Sales Of Any Machinery And Equipment Not Later Than Three Months After The Completion Of Construction Of The Facility, Or Any Addition Thereon, To Be Used In The Facility, To Qualified Businesses As Defined In This Act; And For Related Purposes.

1480.title: Appropriation; Hinds County Board of Supervisors for construction of Byram-Clinton Norrell Road Parkway Project.
1480.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Hinds County Board Of Supervisors For The Purpose Of Completing The Funding For The Construction Of Segment 1a For The Byram-clinton Norrell Road Parkway Project For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1481.title: Appropriation; IHL Board for planning, designing, constructing and equipping a clinical research unit at UMMC.
1481.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of The Planning, Design, Construction, Renovation, Addition, Furnishing And Equipping Of A Clinical Research Unit At Any Health Care Facility Under The Direction And Control Of The University Of Mississippi Medical Center For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1482.title: Appropriation; Archives & History for funds to Mississippi Heritage Trust to develop Historic Preservation Toolkit.
1482.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Archives And History For The Purpose Of Providing Funds To The Mississippi Heritage Trust To Research, Develop And Implement A Comprehensive Mississippi Historic Preservation Toolkit And Develop A Model That Will Provide For Collaborative For-profit, Nonprofit And Governmental Incentives For Historic Preservation Development For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1483.title: Appropriation; DFA for first-year cost of renovation, furnishing and equipping the MS Coliseum.
1483.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Finance And Administration For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The First Year Cost Of Renovating, Furnishing And Equipping The Mississippi Coliseum For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1484.title: Appropriations; City of Tupelo for constructing Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall and improvements at Elvis Presley Birthplace.
1484.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The City Of Tupelo For The Purpose Of Constructing A Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall At The Tupelo Veterans Plaza And Expansion And Improvements At The Elvis Presley Birthplace For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1485.title: Appropriations; MS Community College Board to provide support for formal river barge training school at Hinds Comm. College.
1485.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi Community College Board For The Purpose Of Supporting The Establishment Of A Formal River Barge Training School At Hinds Community College For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1486.title: Appropriation; SDE for the establishment of comprehensive dyslexia program in the Smith County School District.
1486.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The State Department Of Education In The Amount Of $360,000.00 To Be Distributed To The Smith County School District For The Establishment Of A Comprehensive Dyslexia Therapy Program For Students In Grade 1 Through Grade 4 For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1487.title: Appropriations; MDOT for completing Economic Development Access Road to U.S. Highway 45 in Baldwyn.
1487.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi Department Of Transportation For The Purpose Of Completing The Economic Development Access Road To U.s. Highway 45 In The City Of Baldwyn For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1488.title: Appropriation; MDOT for installing lighting at intersection of MS Hwy. 145 and U.S. Hwy. 45 in Saltillo.
1488.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi Department Of Transportation For The Purpose Of Installing Lighting At The Intersection Of Mississippi Highway 145 And U.s. Highway 45 In The City Of Saltillo For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1489.title: Appropriation; Board on Law Enforcement Officer Standards and Training for enhancement to Fallen Officers Memorial.
1489.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board On Law Enforcement Officer Standards And Training For The Purpose Of Providing For The Construction On An Enhancement To The Fallen Officers Memorial For The Fiscal Year 2015.

1490.title: Appropriation; Dept. of Public Safety for grants to local law enforcement agencies for bullet proof vests for law enforcement officers.
1490.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Public Safety For The Purpose Of Providing Grants To Local Law Enforcement Agencies For Purchasing Bullet Proof Vests For Law Enforcement Officers For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1491.title: Appropriation; Dept of Public Safety for training employees of the Juvenile Detention Facilities Monitoring Unit.
1491.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Public Safety For The Purpose Of Training Employees Of The Juvenile Detention Facilities Monitoring Unit For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1493.title: Appropriation; IHL for MS Valley State University for lowering tuition rate for 2015-2016 academic year.
1493.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning To Provide Additional Funding To Mississippi Valley State University For The Purpose Of Lowering The Tuition Rate For The 2015-2016 Academic Year, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1494.title: Appropriation; IHL for establishing an accredited School of Public Health at Jackson State University.
1494.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For Establishing An Accredited School Of Public Health At Jackson State University For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1495.title: Appropriations; Bridge Replacement and Rehabilitation Fund for funding bridge program.
1495.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Local System Bridge Replacement And Rehabilitation Fund For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The Local System Bridge Replacement And Rehabilitation Program For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1496.title: Appropriation; MDOT to replace funds transferred from in past years.
1496.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi Department Of Transportation For The Purpose Of Replacing Funds Transferred From The Mississippi Department Of Transportation In Past Years For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1497.title: Appropriation; City of Waveland to construct a building to house its famous carousel in its Hurricane Katrina Museum.
1497.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The City Of Waveland For The Purpose Of Constructing A Building To House Its Famous Carousel That Was Donated To Its Hurricane Katrina Museum For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1498.title: Appropriation; City of Jackson for police coverage and traffic control at state-sponsored events.
1498.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The City Of Jackson For The Purpose Of Providing Compensation For Police Coverage And Traffic Control At State-sponsored Events Within The Jackson City Limit For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1499.title: Appropriation; Dept of Public Safety to provide funding for the accredited Law Enforcement Agencies Award Fund.
1499.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Public Safety For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The Accredited Law Enforcement Agencies Award Fund For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1500.title: Appropriation; IHL for funding the Speech-Language Pathologists Loan Forgiveness Program.
1500.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Board Of Trustees Of State Institutions Of Higher Learning For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The Speech-language Pathologists Loan Forgiveness Program For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1501.title: Appropriation; community colleges support at one-half mid-level funding commitment.
1501.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Aid And Support Of The Public Community And Junior Colleges Of The State Of Mississippi For Fiscal Year 2016, Reaching One-half Of The Commitment To Mid-level Funding In Accordance With Senate Bill No. 2364 Which Passed Unanimously During The 2007 Regular Session.

1502.title: Appropriation; Administrative Office of Courts for certain youth courts' pilot program.
1502.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Administrative Office Of Courts For The Purpose Of Funding One-half Of The Cost Of Maintaining The Parent Representation Pilot Projects In Youth Courts In Certain Counties; And For Related Purposes.

1503.title: Appropriation; City of Jackson for reimbursement for payment to employees serving on emergency management support force.
1503.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The City Of Jackson For The Purpose Of Reimbursing The City For Payment Of Municipal Employees Serving As Members Of The Emergency Management Support Force For The Fiscal Year 2015.

1504.title: Appropriations; National Guard for expenses of MS National Guard Educational Assistance Program for FY 2015 and 2016.
1504.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi National Guard For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi National Guard Educational Assistance Program For Fiscal Years 2015 And 2016.

1505.title: Appropriation; National Guard for MS National Guard Educational Assistance Program.
1505.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi National Guard For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi National Guard Educational Assistance Program For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1506.title: Appropriations; National Guard for MS National Guard Educational Assistance Program for FY 15.
1506.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi National Guard For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi National Guard Educational Assistance Program For The Fiscal Year 2015.

1507.title: Appropriation; DFA for first-year cost of constructing, furnishing & equipping a new Dept. of Public Safety Headquarters.
1507.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Finance And Administration For The Purpose Of Providing Funding For The First Year Cost Of Constructing, Furnishing And Equipping A New Headquarters For The Department Of Public Safety In Rankin County For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1529.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Office Of The Attorney General For Fiscal Year 2016.

1530.title: Appropriation; Supreme Court, Court of Appeals and trial judges services.
1530.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi State Supreme Court Which Is Comprised Of The Supreme Court, The Office Of The Supreme Court Clerk And The State Law Library And To Pay Expenses Of Special Judges, Chancellors And Circuit Judges, And For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Administrative Office Of Courts And Certified Court Reporters, Continuing Legal Education, Court Of Appeals And The Board Of Bar Admissions, For The Fiscal Year 2016; And For Related Purposes.

1531.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Paying Salaries And Travel Expenses Of District Attorneys And Assistant District Attorneys Of The State And Paying Office Expenses Of District Attorneys For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1532.title: Appropriation; Capital Post-Conviction Counsel, Office of.
1532.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Office Of Capital Post-conviction Counsel Of The State Of Mississippi For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1535.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Funding K-12 And Other Related Educational Activities, Including Certain Agencies And Programs, In The State Of Mississippi, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1536.title: Appropriation; Educational Television, Authority for.
1536.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Authority For Educational Television For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1537.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Mississippi Library Commission For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1541.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The State Forestry Commission And For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Institute For Forest Inventory For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1542.title: Appropriation; Foresters, Board of Registration for.
1542.description: An Act Making An Appropriation From Special Funds In The State Treasury For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The State Board Of Registration For Foresters For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1543.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The State Soil And Water Conservation Commission For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1544.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Department Of Marine Resources For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1545.title: Appropriation; Grand Gulf Military Monument Commission.
1545.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Grand Gulf Military Monument Commission For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1546.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Mississippi River Parkway Commission For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Commission For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1547.description: An Act Approving The Expenditure Of Special Funds For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Pat Harrison Waterway District For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1548.title: Appropriation; Yellow Creek State Inland Port Authority.
1548.description: An Act Approving The Expenditure Of Special Funds For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Yellow Creek State Inland Port Authority For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1549.title: Appropriation; Pearl River Basin Development District.
1549.description: An Act Approving The Expenditure Of Special Funds For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Pearl River Basin Development District For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1550.title: Appropriation; Pearl River Valley Water Supply District.
1550.description: An Act Approving The Expenditure Of Special Funds For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Pearl River Valley Water Supply District For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1551.title: Appropriation; Port Authority, State.
1551.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi State Port Authority At Gulfport For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1552.title: Appropriation; Insurance, Department of.
1552.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Department Of Insurance For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1553.title: Appropriation; Fire Academy.
1553.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The State Fire Academy For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1554.title: Appropriation; Health, Department of.
1554.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The State Department Of Health For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1555.title: Appropriation; Human Services, Department of.
1555.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Human Services; And For Related Purposes, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1556.title: Appropriation; Wildlife, Fisheries and Parks, Department of.
1556.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Department Of Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1557.title: Appropriation; Environmental Quality, Department of.
1557.description: An Act Making An Appropriation For The Support And Maintenance Of The Department Of Environmental Quality; And For Related Purposes, For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1558.title: Appropriation; Public Service Commission.
1558.description: An Act Making An Appropriation From Special Funds In The State Treasury For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Mississippi Public Service Commission For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1559.title: Appropriation; Public Utilities Staff.
1559.description: An Act Making An Appropriation From Special Funds In The State Treasury For The Purpose Of Defraying The Expenses Of The Public Utilities Staff For The Fiscal Year 2016.

1560.title: Appropriation; Rehabilitation Services, Department of.
1560.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Rehabilitation Services For Fiscal Year 2016.

1561.title: Appropriation; reappropriation, DFA - Bureau of Building;FY15.
1561.description: An Act Making A Reappropriation To The Department Of Finance And Administration To Reauthorize The Expenditure Of Special Funds Previously Appropriated For Construction And/or Repair And Renovation Projects At Various State Agencies And Institutions, For Fiscal Year 2016.

1562.title: Appropriation: Department of Finance and Administration grant to Mississippi Home Corporation.
1562.description: An Act Making An Appropriation To The Department Of Finance And Administration To Defray Certain Expenses Of The Mississippi Home Corporation For Fiscal Years 2015 And 2016.

1563.title: Humphreys County; authorize to contribute funds for little league baseball teams within the county.
1563.description: An Act To Authorize The Board Of Supervisors Of Humphreys County To Expend Funds During Fiscal Year 2015 And Fiscal Year 2016 To Support The Little League Baseball Activities In Humphreys County; And For Related Purposes.

1565.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for repair and renovation of state-owned buildings and facilities.
1565.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Repair And Renovation Of State-owned Buildings And Facilities; And For Related Purposes.

1566.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide matching funds for the Hugh White State Park/Lake Access Road Project in Grenada County.
1566.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds For The Office Of State Aid Road Construction To Provide Matching Funds For The Hugh White State Park/lake Access Road Project In Grenada County, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1567.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for improvements to the Elvis Presley Birthplace, Museum and Chapel in Tupelo.
1567.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The Elvis Presley Memorial Foundation In Tupelo, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Incurred For Expansion Of And Improvements And Additions To The Elvis Presley Birthplace, Museum And Chapel And Related Facilities In Tupelo; To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Of Construction Of A Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall And The Staging Of An F-105 Plane At The Tupelo Veterans Plaza In Tupelo; And For Related Purposes.

1568.title: Bonds; authorize issuance for construction of Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall and staging of F-105 plane at Tupelo Veterans Plaza.
1568.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist In Paying The Costs Of Construction Of A Vietnam Veterans Memorial Wall And The Staging Of An F-105 Plane At The Tupelo Veterans Plaza In Tupelo, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1569.title: Bonds; authorize the issuance of general obligation bonds for an aquarium located in the City of Gulfport.
1569.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds To Assist The City Of Gulfport, Mississippi, In Paying Costs Associated With The Construction Of An Aquarium Facility In The City Of Gulfport; And For Related Purposes.

1570.title: Bonds; authorize issuance to provide funds to assist in construction of Center for Manufacturing Technology Excellence.
1570.description: An Act To Authorize The Issuance Of State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For Construction, Furnishing And Equipping Of A New Building And Related Facilities To House The Center For Manufacturing Technology Excellence At The East Mississippi Community College Golden Triangle Campus In Lowndes County, Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1571.title: Income tax; exempt a portion of income of certain physician/nurse practitioners practicing in critical physician shortage areas.
1571.description: An Act Entitled The "mississippi Critical Physician And Nurse Practitioner Shortage Incentive Act Of 2015"; To Provide That The Gross Income Of Newly Licensed Physicians And Nurse Practitioners Practicing Medicine And Residing In Critical Physician Shortage Areas Shall Not Include Any Income In Excess Of $100,000.00 Derived From Providing Medical Services In Critical Physician Shortage Areas; To Provide That The Exemption From Gross Income Authorized By This Section May Be Utilized By The Qualifying Physician Or Nurse Practitioner For Ten Consecutive Years If The Physician Or Nurse Practitioner Practices And Resides In Such An Area For That Period Of Time; To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1572.title: Small business participating loan program; create and authorize issuance of bonds for.
1572.description: An Act To Establish The Small Business Participating Loan Program To Be Administered By The Mississippi Development Authority; To Provide That The Program Shall Provide Loans To Small Businesses For The Purpose Of Encouraging The Extension Of Conventional Financing And The Issuance Of Letters Of Credit To Small Businesses By Private Institutions; To Provide That The Amount Of A Loan To A Small Business Under The Program Shall Not Exceed 50% Of The Total Cost Of The Project For Which Financing Is Sought Or $100,000.00, Whichever Is Less; To Create The Mississippi Small Business Participating Loan Program Revolving Fund In The State Treasury From Which Money To Make The Loans Under The Program Shall Be Drawn; To Authorize The Issuance Of General Obligation Bonds In The Amount Of $50,000,000.00 To Provide Funds For The Program; And For Related Purposes.

1573.title: Income tax; authorize first-time home buyer savings accounts and exclude contributions/distributions from gross income.
1573.description: An Act To Authorize Taxpayers To Establish First-time Home Buyer Savings Accounts; To Define Certain Terms; To Provide That The Amounts Contributed To A First-time Home Buyer Savings Account, Interest And Other Income Earned On An Account And Distributions From Such An Account That Are Used To Pay Eligible Costs Related To The Purchase Of A Single-family Residence Shall Be Excluded From The Gross Income Of The Account Holder Under The State Income Tax Law; To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1574.title: Sales tax; revise provisions regarding sales of nonperishable food items to certain charitable organizations.
1574.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Food Items To Charitable Organizations That Are Exempt From Federal Income Taxation Under Section 501(c)(3) Of The Internal Revenue Code, Operate As Part Of Or In Coordination With A Senior Nutrition Program And Use The Food Items To Cook Or Otherwise Prepare Meals That Are Delivered And Provided At No Charge To Persons Who Are In Need Due To Age, Disability, Or Other Health Related Matters, Or Other Reasons; And For Related Purposes.

1575.title: Sales tax; exempt sales of water and sawdust when used for agricultural purposes.
1575.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Potable Water To A Producer For Use Directly In The Production Of Poultry Or Poultry Products, The Production Of Livestock And Livestock Products, The Production Of Domesticated Fish And Domesticated Fish Products, The Production Of Marine Aquaculture Products, The Production Of Plants Or Food By Commercial Horticulturists, The Processing Of Milk And Milk Products, The Processing Of Poultry And Livestock Feed And The Irrigation Of Farm Crops; To Amend Section 27-65-103, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Sawdust To A Producer For Use Directly In The Production Of Poultry Or Poultry Products, The Production Of Livestock And Livestock Products, The Production Of Domesticated Fish And Domesticated Fish Products, The Production Of Marine Aquaculture Products, The Production Of Plants Or Food By Commercial Horticulturists, The Processing Of Milk And Milk Products, The Processing Of Poultry And Livestock Feed And The Irrigation Of Farm Crops; And For Related Purposes.

1576.title: Income tax; authorize a deduction for certain retrofitting or upgrades to homes in Coastal Area of Mississippi.
1576.description: An Act To Provide An Income Tax Deduction For Certain Retrofitting Or Upgrades To Homes Located In The Coastal Area Of Mississippi; And For Related Purposes.

1577.title: Income tax; authorize deduction for private school tuition, expenses for home schooled students and certain public schools.
1577.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-18, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Tuition Payments Made By A Taxpayer For Tuition Required For A Dependent Child To Attend A Nonpublic School, Certain Expenses Paid By A Taxpayer For The Home Schooling Of A Dependent Child And Certain Costs Paid By A Taxpayer Which Are Associated With The Enrollment Of A Dependent Child In A Public School, Are Deductible As An Adjustment To Gross Income For State Income Tax Purposes; And For Related Purposes.

1578.title: Contractor's tax; revise certain provisions relating to oil and gas well.
1578.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Upon Every Person Engaging Or Continuing In This State In The Business Of Contracting Or Performing A Contract Of Completing An Oil Well Or A Gas Well, There Is Levied, Assessed And Shall Be Collected A Tax Equal To Three And One-half Percent Of The Total Contract Price Or Compensation Received When Such Compensation Exceeds Ten Thousand Dollars; And For Related Purposes.

1579.title: Privilege tax; establish for vehicles carrying certain loads at a licensed gross vehicle weight between 80,001 and 84,000 pounds.
1579.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-19-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Establish A Privilege Tax For Certain Vehicles That Are Transporting Sand, Gravel, Wood Chips, Wood Shavings, Sawdust, Fill Dirt, Agricultural Products Or Unprocessed Forestry Products At A Licensed Gross Vehicle Weight Of Eighty Thousand One Pounds To Eighty Four Thousand Pounds; To Authorize Certain Vehicles To Pay A Privilege Tax To Operate At A Gross Vehicle Weight Of Four Thousand Pounds Greater Than The Maximum Allowed; To Amend Sections 27-19-81, 27-19-89, 63-5-33 And 65-1-46, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity With The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.

1580.title: Electric vehicles; impose annual tax on.
1580.description: An Act To Impose An Annual Tax On Electric Vehicles In Addition To Any Other Taxes For Which The Vehicle Is Liable; To Define "electric Vehicle"; To Provide That The Tax Shall Be Paid To The County Tax Collector At The Same Time And In The Same Manner As The Annual Highway Privilege Tax Is Paid; To Provide For The Amount Of The Tax; To Provide That The Tax Collector Shall Remit The Proceeds Of The Tax To The Department Of Revenue; To Provide That The Department Shall Apportion The Proceeds Of The Tax Among The Various Purposes Specified For Gasoline And Diesel Fuel Taxes In The Same Proportion That Those Taxes Were Apportioned For Those Purposes During The Previous State Fiscal Year; And For Related Purposes.

1581.title: Motor fuels tax, certain; provide continued collection of when Groundwater Protection Trust Fund reaches $10 million for highways & bridges.
1581.description: An Act To Amend Section 49-17-407, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Environmental Protection Tax Imposed On Bonded Distributors On Motor Fuels Shall Continue To Be Collected When The Mississippi Groundwater Protection Trust Fund Reaches Ten Million Dollars And Such Collections Shall Be Deposited In Equal Amounts Into The State Aid Road Fund And The Local System Bridge Replacement And Rehabilitation Fund; To Amend Section 49-17-435, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; And For Related Purposes.

1582.title: Excise tax on gasoline and diesel; revise rate.
1582.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-55-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Rate Of The Gasoline Excise Tax; To Bring Forward Sections 27-55-12, 27-55-19 And 27-55-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For Certain Exemptions And Refunds Under The Gasoline Excise Tax Law, For The Purposes Of Amendment; To Amend Section 27-55-519, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Rate Of The Special Fuel Excise Tax Imposed On Undyed Diesel Fuel; To Bring Forward Sections 27-55-521, 27-55-523 And 27-55-533, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Are Sections Of The Mississippi Special Fuel Tax Law, For Purposes Of Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-5-101, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For The Distribution Of Fuel Taxes, For The Purpose Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.

1583.title: Sales tax; reduce rate imposed on retail sales of boats, motorcycles and towable camping trailers.
1583.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce The Rate Of Sales Tax Imposed On Retail Sales Of Boats, Motorcycles And Towable Camping Trailers; And For Related Purposes.

1584.title: Ad valorem tax; create 10% cap on increase in assessed value of agricultural property and commercial poultry houses.
1584.description: An Act To Provide That The Assessed Value Of Agricultural Property Or Property Used For Or In Association With Commercial Poultry Houses May Not Be Increased More Than 10% Above The Assessed Value Of The Property For The Next Preceding Year For Purposes Of Ad Valorem Taxation; To Grant An Exemption From Ad Valorem Taxes In The Amount Of The Difference Between The Assessment Of Agricultural Property Or Property Used For Or In Association With Commercial Poultry Houses At True Value And The Assessment Subject To The 10% Limitation; And For Related Purposes.

1585.title: Sales tax; exempt sales of tangible personal property and services to the Univ. of MS Medical Center Research Development Foundation.
1585.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Tangible Personal Property And Services To The University Of Mississippi Medical Center Research Development Foundation; And For Related Purposes.

1586.title: Income tax; increase amount of National Guard and Reserve compensation excluded from gross income.
1586.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To

1587.title: Income tax; exclude overtime compensation from gross income.
1587.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exclude Overtime Compensation From The Definition Of "gross Income" For Purposes Of The State Income Tax Law; And For Related Purposes.

1588.title: Sales tax; reduce rate on sales of equipment to contractors for use in road construction.
1588.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce The Sales Tax Rate On Retail Sales Of Equipment, And Parts And Labor Used To Maintain Or Repair Such Equipment, To Contractors For Use Solely In The Construction, Reconstruction, Repair, Rehabilitation Or Resurfacing Of Highways, Roads Or Bridges In This State; And For Related Purposes.

1589.title: Income tax; exempt net income of certain physicians and other health care professionals practicing in critical physician shortage areas.
1589.description: An Act Entitled The "mississippi Critical Physician, Physician Assistant, Nurse, Nurse Practitioner, Nurse Anesthetist And Dentist Shortage Incentive Act Of 2015"; To Provide That The Net Income Of Newly Licensed Physicians, Physician Assistants, Nurses, Nurse Practitioners, Nurse Anesthetists And Dentists Which Is Derived From Practicing In Critical Physician Shortage Areas Shall Be Exempt From Income Taxation; To Provide That The Exemption From Income Taxation Authorized By This Act May Be Utilized By The Qualifying Physician, Physician Assistant, Nurse, Nurse Practitioner, Nurse Anesthetist Or Dentist For Ten Consecutive Years If The Physician, Physician Assistant, Nurse, Nurse Practitioner, Nurse Anesthetist Or Dentist Practices In Such An Area For That Period Of Time; To Amend Section 27-7-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1590.title: Sales tax; exempt gifts and sales of tangible personal property and services to certain cultural and educational centers.
1590.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Gifts Or Sales Of Tangible Personal Property Or Services To Any Cultural And Educational Center That Is Located In A Building Listed On The National Register Of Historic Places, Operated By A Nonprofit Organization And Located Within A Qualified Resort Area; And For Related Purposes.

1591.title: Taxes; exempt public property or facilities financed by New Market Tax Credit transactions from certain taxes.
1591.description: An Act To Amend Section 57-105-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From All Taxation In The State Of Mississippi Except The Contractors Tax All Mortgages Or Deeds Of Trust Executed As Security For Public Property Or Facilities By Public Benefit Corporations, All Lease, Loan Or Purchase Agreements Made By Public Benefit Corporations For Public Property Or Facilities, And All Purchases Required To Establish The Public Property Or Facilities Financed By The Proceeds From New Markets Tax Credit Transactions Or Related Transactions; To Exempt From All Taxation In The State Of Mississippi All Public Property Or Facilities Financed By The Proceeds From New Markets Tax Credit Transactions Or Related Transactions And The Revenue Derived From Any Lease Thereof From All Taxation In The State Of Mississippi, Except The Contractor's Tax And Income Tax; To Provide That No Ad Valorem Tax Exemption Authorized Under This Act Shall Be Granted Unless Approved By The Appropriate Local Taxing Authority; To Provide That There Shall Be No Exemption From Ad Valorem Taxes Levied For School District Purposes; To Provide That Ad Valorem Tax Exemptions Authorized Under This Act Shall Not Exceed 10 Years From The Date Of The Completion Of The Public Property Or Facility; To Amend Section 27-65-105, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1592.title: Sales tax; exempt retail sales of school supplies during the last weekend in August.
1592.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation The Retail Sales Of Certain School Supplies During A Period Beginning At 12:01 A.m. On The Last Friday In August And Ending At 12:00 Midnight The Following Saturday; And For Related Purposes.

1593.title: Sales tax; exempt sales, admissions and parking at events to raise funds for schools and volunteer fire departments.
1593.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-22, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From The Amusement Tax Admissions To Events Held Solely For The Purpose Of Raising Funds For A School Or An Organization Affiliated With A School And Admissions To Events Held Solely For The Purpose Of Raising Funds For A Volunteer Fire Department; To Amend Section 27-65-105, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Parking At Events Held Solely For The Purpose Of Raising Funds For A School Or An Organization Affiliated With A School; To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Gross Proceeds From Sales Of Food, Merchandise Or Other Concessions At An Event Held Solely For The Purpose Of Raising Funds For A Volunteer Fire Department; And For Related Purposes.

1594.title: Income tax; reduce.
1594.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-7-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Reduce The State Income Tax By Revising The Amounts Of Taxable Income Subject To The Income Tax Rates; And For Related Purposes.

1595.title: Ad valorem tax; exempt certain business personal property.
1595.description: An Act To Exempt From Ad Valorem Taxation Certain Personal Property That Is Owned By A Business Enterprise And Used By The Business Enterprise Solely On The Premises Of The Business Enterprise In The Operation Of The Enterprise; And For Related Purposes.

1596.title: Sales tax; exempt certain sales of gold, silver and other metals at coin collectors trade shows.
1596.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-111, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales At Coin Shows Of Gold, Silver, Or Numismatic Coins And Currency Or Of Platinum, Gold Or Silver Bullion When The Total Sales Price Of All Of The Items Sold Per Transaction Is One Thousand Dollars Or More; And For Related Purposes.

1597.title: Housing Loan Assistance Pilot Program; create and authorize of bonds to provide funds for.
1597.description: An Act To Create The Housing Loan Assistance Pilot Program To Be Administered By The Mississippi Development Authority For The Purpose Of Providing Loans To Certain Persons To Repair An Existing Home Or To Construct A New Home; To Authorize The Issuance Of $3,000,000.00 In State General Obligation Bonds To Provide Funds For The Housing Loan Assistance Pilot Program; To Create The Housing Loan Assistance Bond Sinking Fund For The Purpose Of Providing That The Principal And Interest On The Bonds Authorized Under This Act Will Be Paid Primarily From Certain Fees Authorized By This Act; To Amend Section 25-7-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Create An Additional Fee For Recording Deeds And Deeds Of Trusts With The Office Of The Chancery Clerk; To Require The Chancery Clerk To Remit Such Fees To The Mississippi Development Authority To Be Deposited Into The Housing Loan Assistance Bond Sinking Fund; And For Related Purposes.

1600.title: Income tax; exempt income of recent graduates of Mississippi 4-year colleges who are employed in state.
1600.description: An Act Entitled The "mississippi Jobs Creation Act Of 2015"; To Provide That The Gross Income Of Recent Graduates Of Four-year Colleges And Universities In Mississippi Shall Not Include Any Income Derived From A Qualifying Job In The State; To Define Certain Terms Used In The Act; To Provide That The Exemption From Gross Income Authorized By This Act May Be Utilized By A Recent Graduate Of A Four-year College Or University For Four Consecutive Years If The Recent Graduate Remains Employed In A Qualifying Job For That Period Of Time; To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Preceding Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.

1601.title: Sales tax; clarify that certain sales to schools under federal programs are exempt.
1601.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-105, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Exempt From Sales Taxation Sales Of Tangible Personal Property, Labor, Services Or Products To Schools And School Districts Under A Program That Is Administered By Or Coordinated With An Agency, Commission, Department Or Other Instrumentality Of The United States Government When Payment For The Tangible Personal Property, Labor Services Or Products Is Made By Or Through A Nonprofit Organization Or Other Entity Established By Or For The Benefit Of The Agency, Commission, Department Or Other Instrumentality Of The United States Government Administering Or Coordinating Such Program; And For Related Purposes.

1602.title: Working Families Tax Credit Act; create to authorize an income tax credit in an amount equal to a portion of earned income tax credit.
1602.description: An Act To Create The Working Families Tax Credit Act; To Authorize An Income Tax Credit In An Amount Equal To A Portion Of The Amount Of The Federal Earned Income Tax Credit Lawfully Claimed By A Taxpayer; And For Related Purposes.

1603.title: Income tax, insurance premium tax and oil and gas severance tax; authorize credit for contributions to school tuition organizations.
1603.description: An Act To Provide A Credit For Taxpayers Who Make Cash Contributions To School Tuition Organizations Against State Income Taxes, Insurance Premium Taxes, And Oil And Gas Severance Taxes; To Define The Term "school Tuition Organization" For Purposes Of This Act; To Provide For The Amount Of The Tax Credit; And For Related Purposes.

1605.title: Freedom Scholarship Tax Credit Act; create.
1605.description: An Act To Create The Freedom Scholarship Tax Credit Act; To Provide That Qualifying Students Shall Be Eligible To Use A Freedom Scholarship From Certain Scholarship Organizations To Cover Eligible Educational Expenses; To Provide For A Corporate Tax Credit Not To Exceed 50% Of The Taxpayers Tax Liability For Contributions To Certain Scholarship Organizations; To Stipulate The Requirements For Nonpublic Schools Accepting Students For Enrollment Who Receive Scholarships Under The Provisions Of This Act; To Prescribe The Requirements For Scholarship Organizations Administering Tax Credit Scholarships; To Require The Department Of Revenue To Provide An Annual Legislative Report On The Tax Credits Allowed Under This Act; To Allow Parents To Request An Assessment Of Educational Progress Of Students Enrolled; To Prescribe The Powers And Duties Of The Department Of Revenue With Regard To The Administration Of This Act; To Provide That Nonpublic Schools Which Admit Students Receiving Tax Credit Scholarships Are Not Agents Of The State Or Federal Government; To Amend Section 27-7-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Amounts Received As Freedom Scholarships To Pay Educational Expense Shall Be Excluded From Gross Income; And For Related Purposes.

1606.title: Income tax; authorize a credit for taxpayers that hire veterans.
1606.description: An Act To Authorize An Income Tax Credit For Taxpayers That Employ Persons Who Are Honorably Discharged Veterans Of The Armed Forces Of The United States; To Provide The Amount Of The Tax Credit; To Limit The Amount Of The Tax Credit That May Be Claimed In A Taxable Year; To Authorize Any Tax Credit Claimed But Not Used In Any Taxable Year To Be Carried Forward For Five Consecutive Years; And For Related Purposes.

1607.title: Income tax; authorize certain employers to pass tax credits through to employees.
1607.description: An Act To Amend Section 57-73-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That A Permanent Business Enterprise That Qualifies For Certain Income Tax Credits May Elect To Pass Through All Or A Portion Of Such Credits To Its Employees; To Provide That A Business Enterprise Desiring To Pass Tax Credits Through To Its Employees Must Notify The Department Of Revenue Of Such Intent And Provide The Department With Certain Information; To Amend Sections 57-87-3, 57-87-5, 57-87-7, 27-111-1 And 27-7-51, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1609.title: Housing repair grant program; authorize issuance of bonds to provide funds for grants to low income individuals for home repair.
1609.description: An Act To Establish A Housing Repair Grant Program To Provide Grants To Certain Low Income Individuals To Make Significant Repairs To Their Homes; To Provide That The Department Of Finance And Administration Shall Administer The Grant Program; To Provide The Maximum Amount Of A Grant Authorized Under The Program; To Prescribe The Requirements To Be Eligible For A Grant Under The Program; To Create A Special Fund In The State Treasury To Be Known As The Mississippi Housing Repair Grant Fund, Which Shall Be Used For The Program; To Authorize The Issuance Of $50,000,000.00 Of State General Obligation Bonds For The Purpose Of Providing Funds For The Program; And For Related Purposes.

1610.title: Income tax; authorize a credit for taxpayers who serve as volunteer firefighters.
1610.description: An Act To Authorize A Refundable Income Tax Credit For Taxpayers Who Serve As Volunteer Firefighters; To Provide The Amount Of The Tax Credit; To Provide That If The Amount Of Tax Credit Claimed By A Taxpayer Exceeds The Amount Of Income Tax Imposed Upon The Taxpayer For The Taxable Year, Then The Taxpayer Shall Receive A Refund From The Department Of Revenue For The Amount Of Such Excess; And For Related Purposes.

1611.title: Income tax; authorize a credit for costs paid by a business enterprise to expand and relocate employees to this state.
1611.description: An Act To Amend Section 57-73-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize An Income Tax Credit For Any Permanent Business Enterprise That Expands Its Labor Forces Into The State Of Mississippi From Outside The State Of Mississippi; To Provide That The Maximum Cumulative Amount Of Tax Credits That May Be Claimed By All Taxpayers Claiming A Credit Under This Act In Any One State Fiscal Year Shall Not Exceed $1,000,000.00, Exclusive Of Credits That Might Be Carried Forward From Previous Taxable Years; To Provide That A Tax Credit Claimed Under This Act But Not Used In A Taxable Year May Be Carried Forward For Five Years From The Close Of The Tax Year In Which The Relocation Costs Were Paid; To Amend Sections 57-87-3, 57-87-5, 57-87-7 And 27-111-1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity Thereto; And For Related Purposes.

1613.title: Income tax; authorize a credit for taxpayers that employ persons convicted of certain felony offenses.
1613.description: An Act To Authorize An Income Tax Credit For Taxpayers That Employ Persons Who Have Been Convicted Of Certain Felony Offenses; To Provide The Amount Of The Tax Credit; To Limit The Amount Of The Tax Credit That May Be Claimed In A Taxable Year; And For Related Purposes.

1614.title: Income tax; authorize a credit for cost of new alternative fueling infrastructure.
